name: Rachida Ouarzazi
summary: Renowned geologist in Morocco's High Atlas and Anti-Atlas regions
description: Dr. Rachida Ouarzazi has made significant contributions to the understanding of Morocco's geological history, particularly the tectonic evolution of the High Atlas and Anti-Atlas mountain ranges. Her research includes detailed studies of the region's geological formations, which have provided valuable insights into the structural dynamics and mineral resources of Morocco. Dr. Ouarzazi's work is integral to the advancement of geoscience in Morocco, offering a deeper understanding of the country's complex geology. Her expertise is sought after by national and international research institutions, and she is a leading voice in Morocco's geological community.
